p: Despite the particular epidemiologic features of COVID-19, it is the third time that, in the last 20 years, an epidemic (or pandemic) originates from the rapid and massive dissemination of an emerging virus, whose circulation was limited for a long time to the natural (animal) reservoirs in which it multiplies. It seems that the virus jumped accidentally to humans which inadvertently entered in close contact with these animals (Hu et al. 2020).
